name: GUS (Brad / Kupidd)
description:
'Gus' is a short side project I've been working on.

Play as a cat in a difficult platformer with no checkpoints, and one goal: the top. Similar to games like Jump King, start at the bottom and make tedious leaps of faith in progressively more difficult stages to reach the final goal!

CONTROLS:
[A] - LEFT
[D] - RIGHT
[SPACE] - JUMP
[R] - RESTART

ENVIRONMENT ART BY ME
CAT ART BY ELTHEN'S PIXEL ART SHOP on ITCH.IO
